Reviews.Title: Plastic camera mounting brackets
Reviews.Author: lynnie
Reviews.Content: The plastic camera mounts were as I ordered. I found the the threaded screw that attaches to the camera was not long enough. I have first alert security cameras. The cameras have a kinda hood on them. So I went to the hardware store, where I had to buy a female bolt extension and bought a 3 in threaded rod and extra nuts and washers. I had to spend an extra 5.00 to retrofit the camera mounts.

ProductInfo.Features:
Product Name : Wall Mount Bracket;Fit for : CCTV Camera, DVR Camera & Spy Camera
Material : Plastic & Metal;Base Diameter : ~ 3.1"
Max. Height : ~ 5";Base Screw Hole Dia. : ~ 0.22"/ 5.8mm
Main Color : Black;Weight : 48g
Package Content : 1 x CCTV Camera Wall Mount Bracket
ProductInfo.Name: DVR CCTV Camera Holder Plastic Wall Mount Bracket Stand Black Rotatable 5"
